headline: Why Ingersoll Rand (IR) Shares Are Plunging Today
summary: Shares of industrial manufacturing company Ingersoll Rand (NYSE:IR) fell 5.8% in the afternoon session after the company reported weak fourth-quarter results. Its organic revenue slightly missed and its revenue was in line with Wall Street's estimates. Looking ahead, guidance largely came in below expectations. Overall, this was a softer quarter.

headline: Ingersoll Rand's Q4 Earnings Meet Estimates, Revenues Miss
